data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Floreşti, Moldova a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Floreşti, Moldova

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Floreşti, Moldova a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 21 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 3,533 believers in Floreşti, Moldova desire the Bible as newborn babies desire milk.
data.verse: Desire God’s pure word as newborn babies desire milk. Then you will grow in your salvation.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Floreşti, Moldova.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Floreşti, Moldova to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Floreşti to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Floreşti, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
